content:
/>
XIV.4.D.14.h
.
Pension Terminated Without Referral to the Rating Activity
If pension is terminated for earned income and the case is not referred to the rating activity, flash the claims folder for referral in case the Veteran files a supplemental claim.
Note
:
Do not flash the claims folder for referral if pension can be granted on a presumptive basis for the applicable period in question.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section D - Federal Tax Information (FTI): Income Verification Match (IVM)
